## Libraries/Packages

```{r}
#| label: load-pkg-data
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(knitr) 
library(tidyverse)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2024, week = 3)

```

```{r}
polling_places <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2024/2024-01-16/polling_places.csv')

```

## EDA

```{r}
#Creating a Year Variable
polling_places <- polling_places %>% 
  mutate(year = substring(election_date, 0, 4))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = polling_places, aes(x = year))+
  geom_bar() +
  labs()
```
